titles.title: Empowering Employer Child and Elder Care Solutions Act
Empowering Employer Child and Elder Care Solutions Act
To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exclude child and dependent care services and payments from the rate used to compute overtime compensation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Empowering Employer Child and Elder Care Solutions Act
This bill excludes the value of employer-funded child or dependent care from being used in calculating an eligible employee's overtime pay rate.
